mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.pid AS "p.id", b.code as "p.code", a.no AS "no", a.cinvcode AS "cinvcode", a.cinvname AS "cinvname", a.cinvstd AS "cinvstd", a.batchno AS "batchno", a.scdate AS "scdate", a.num AS "num", a.unit AS "unit", a.minnum AS "minnum", a.ckcode AS "ckcode", a.ckname AS "ckname", a.hw AS "hw", a.printstatus as "printstatus", a.csocode AS "csocode", a.irowno AS "irowno"
LEFT JOIN business_ommo_arrivalvouch b ON b.id = a.pid
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO business_ommo_arrivalvouch_mx( id,printstatus, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, pid, no, cinvcode, cinvname, cinvstd, batchno, scdate, num, unit, minnum, ckcode, ckname, hw, csocode, irowno ) VALUES
( #{item.id},'未打印', #{item.createBy.id}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.updateBy.id}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.remarks}, #{item.delFlag}, #{item.p.id}, #{item.no}, #{item.cinvcode}, #{item.cinvname}, #{item.cinvstd}, #{item.batchno}, #{item.scdate}, #{item.num}, #{item.unit}, #{item.minnum}, #{item.ckcode}, #{item.ckname}, #{item.hw}, #{item.csocode}, #{item.irowno} )
on duplicate key update id = values(id), update_date= VALUES(update_date), no=VALUES(no), hw=VALUES(hw), pid=VALUES(pid), cinvcode=VALUES(cinvcode), cinvname=VALUES(cinvname), cinvstd=VALUES(cinvstd), batchno=VALUES(batchno), scdate=VALUES(scdate), num=VALUES(num), unit=VALUES(unit), ckcode=VALUES(ckcode), ckname=VALUES(ckname), ckname=VALUES(ckname), irowno=VALUES(irowno)

INSERT INTO business_ommo_arrivalvouch_mx( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, pid, no, cinvcode, cinvname, cinvstd, batchno, scdate, num, unit, minnum, ckcode, ckname, hw, csocode, irowno ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{p.id}, #{no}, #{cinvcode}, #{cinvname}, #{cinvstd}, #{batchno}, #{scdate}, #{num}, #{unit}, #{minnum}, #{ckcode}, #{ckname}, #{hw}, #{csocode}, #{irowno} )
mapper.update: UPDATE business_ommo_arrivalvouch_mx SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, pid = #{p.id}, no = #{no}, cinvcode = #{cinvcode}, cinvname = #{cinvname}, cinvstd = #{cinvstd}, batchno = #{batchno}, scdate = #{scdate}, num = #{num}, unit = #{unit}, minnum = #{minnum}, ckcode = #{ckcode}, ckname = #{ckname}, hw = #{hw}, csocode = #{csocode}, irowno = #{irowno} WHERE id = #{id}
